chargeHist.descr: Repeated Sexual Assault of Same Child (At Least 3 Violations of 1st or 2nd Degree Sexual Assault)
Repeated Sexual Assault of Same Child (At Least 3 Violations of 1st or 2nd Degree Sexual Assault)

result.execSummary:
The defendant Christopher Steven Weight was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Exposing Genitals/Pubic Area/Intimate Parts to a Child, a class I felony, Wisconsin Statutes 948.10(1)(a).
  • 4th Degree Sexual Assault, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 940.225(3m).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes: Costs to be paid directly to the Waushara County Clerk of Court within 60 days or establish a payment plan.  Failure to pay may result in suspension of your driver's license, tax intercept, a civil judgment being entered against you, a warrant being issued for your arrest for contempt and/or the debt being turned over to a collection agency.
Defendant to obtain and maintain gainful full time employment.

No contact with females under the age of 18 years unless in the presence of a parent or guardian and must be specifically approved by the Supervising Agent.  No contact would include any contact utilizing social media and/or via text message.

Complete a Sex Offender Treatment Assessment and comply with any further counseling and/or treatment as deemed appropriate by the Supervising Agent.  SOT Assessment solely at Agent's discretion.    DNA sample to be provided and surcharge assessed.

timeConds.notes: No Good Time credit.  Huber Privileges granted within the rules of the Huber Program.

records.descr: Notice and acknowledge of def voting ineligibility

records.addlTxt: Case Called @ 11:00 AM: Defendant Christopher Steven Weight in court with attorney Steven R. Kohn.  Scott C. Blader appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Def confirms that Chapter 950 is in full compliance.  Pastor Rohde from Trinity Lutheran in Wautoma makes a statement to the Court prior to SEH.  Argument by DA.  Argument by Atty Kohn.  Statement by Def:  Yes.  The Court:  Will follow recommendation made:  Ct 1:  S/W - 3 yrs probation.  Ct 2:  S/W - 2 yrs probation.  Concurrent terms on probation.  Conditions:  Any counseling as deemed appropriate by Agent, including and SOT, SOT not required however defers to Agent if necessary; no contact with any females under 18 yrs unless in the presence of parent or guardian and unless specifically approved by Agent, contact would include electronic contact on social media or via text message; maintain gainful employment understanding that he is not currently employed; 9 mos WCJ cond'l time, Report no later than 11/1/2015 @ 8:00 PM, No GT; DNA sample to be provided today.  Ct 2 conditions the same but for no conditional time.  Appeal Rights Given

Case Called @ 1:10 PM:  Defendant Christopher Steven Weight in court with attorney Steven R. Kohn.  Scott C. Blader appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Per DA:  Matter will proceed to Plea Hrg today w/bifurcated SEH date.  Resolution recited by DA with argued terms on sentencing.  State will be moving for amendment of INFO to 2 separate counts - counsel will stipulate to factual basis on amendment offered.  Def and counsel concur w/State's recital.  Court entertains waiver of pre-lim hearing in its entirety.  Court accepts knowing and voluntary waiver of pre-lim hearing.  Establishes factual basis for a felony crime.  Def BOT.  INFO Filed.  INFO stated - mirrors Complaint Filed.  Understanding amendment offered to 2 separate charges -  Reading Waived.    Defendant advised of minimum/maximum penalty as to both amended charges and elements of offenses.  Terms of bifurcated SEH explained.  Plea QN reviewed w/Defendant.  Plea colloquy entertained.  Collateral consequences explained. Chapter 950 compliance addressed - in compliance for today's hearing. Court accepts State's Motion to amend  Ct 1 to Exposing contrary to s. 948.10 Class I Fel (12/6/2014) Plea:  NC  Also accepts State's Motion to incorporate Ct 2 4th Deg SA contrary to s. 940.225(3m) (12/7/2014), Class A Misd Plea:  NC   Factual basis to accept pleas offered - Court accepts pleas and enters JOC to Cts 1 and 2.   Court advises Def that bond conditions remain pending SEH - agreement reached may be put in jeopardy if bond violations occur.  Sentencing hearing scheduled for October 1, 2015 at 11:00 am.

NOT PUT OF RECORD: Attorney Steven R. Kohn in court appears telephonically.  Scott C. Blader appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Atty Kohn requesting a plea hearing.  Plea hearing scheduled for August 18, 2015 at 01:00 pm.

ADDRESS INFO for Christopher Steven Weight

Prior: W5163 Buttercup Dr, Wautoma, WI 54982
Complete ID process with the Sheriff's Department.  No contact with any females under the age of 18 years unless in the immediate presence of a parent or guardian.

records.descr: Waiver of time limits for preliminary hearing

records.addlTxt: Case Called @ 1:11 PM: Defendant Christopher Steven Weight in court with attorney Steven R. Kohn.  Steven Paul Anderson appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Complaint Stated - Advised of offense and minimum/maximum penalty.  Receipt Admitted - Reading Waived.  Preliminary Hearing and Time Limits discussed.  Defendant wishes to waive time limits for preliminary hearing. Court questions defendant and accepts waiver of time limits for preliminary hearing.   ADA argues for Signature Bond w/conditions.  Def's counsel joins in request for Signature Bond.  STC Scheduled - NOH Given.  Court enters Riverside Ruling in favor of the State.  Per Atty Kohn - new address provided - Def is in the process of moving.  Status conference scheduled for July 6, 2015 at 03:10 pm.
